snippet: Stocks rose on Monday because of data that showed an increase in manufacturing activity, but sales from investors late in the day reduced the session’s highs.
abstract: Stocks rise because of data showing an increase in manufacturing activity, but late-day sell-offs reduce session’s highs.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Monday because of data that showed an increase in manufacturing activity, but sales from investors late in the day reduced the session’s highs.

headline.main: Traders Book Day’s Gains, Blunting a Rally Set Off by Encouraging Economic Data
headline.print_headline: Traders Book Day’s Gains, Blunting a Rally Set Off by Encouraging Economic Data
